body_html:
The thing that doesn't make sense to me is: https://gist.github.com/csarofeen/141bb62c49f1d1b8e867a8d50ea62a4e
prints:

Seq_size 2
hidden_size 3
inp_size 4
batch_size 5
num_layers 2
weight_ih_l0 torch.Size([12, 4])
weight_hh_l0 torch.Size([12, 3])
weight_ih_l0_reverse torch.Size([12, 4])
weight_hh_l0_reverse torch.Size([12, 3])
weight_ih_l1 torch.Size([12, 6])
weight_hh_l1 torch.Size([12, 3])
weight_ih_l1_reverse torch.Size([12, 6])
weight_hh_l1_reverse torch.Size([12, 3])

Here the ih_l1 weights don't make sense to me, shouldn't they be same size as hh?

body:
The thing that doesn't make sense to me is: https://gist.github.com/csarofeen/141bb62c49f1d1b8e867a8d50ea62a4e
prints:
```
Seq_size 2
hidden_size 3
inp_size 4
batch_size 5
num_layers 2
weight_ih_l0 torch.Size([12, 4])
weight_hh_l0 torch.Size([12, 3])
weight_ih_l0_reverse torch.Size([12, 4])
weight_hh_l0_reverse torch.Size([12, 3])
weight_ih_l1 torch.Size([12, 6])
weight_hh_l1 torch.Size([12, 3])
weight_ih_l1_reverse torch.Size([12, 6])
weight_hh_l1_reverse torch.Size([12, 3])
```
Here the ih_l1 weights don't make sense to me, shouldn't they be same size as hh?
